title: Part-time job control status (1) Prohibited category
question: Can the researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica hold other public positions concurrently?
answer: Unless otherwise specified by law, researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica cannot concurrently hold other public positions.

title: Part-time job control status (1) Prohibited category
question: If it is a licensed occupation, can the researchers and research technicians of the Academia Sinica work concurrently?
answer: The researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica are generally not allowed to concurrently serve as licensed occupations unless they are specifically stipulated by laws and regulations. Licensed occupations refer to jobs that require licenses or certificates, such as doctors or lawyers, are licensed occupations. However, if they participate in social welfare activities or other irregular and non-continuous work outside of working hours, or their sideline job is the content of teaching or research work identified by Academia Sinica, these situations are acceptable.

title: Part-time job control status (1) Prohibited category
question: For social welfare activities or non-recurring work, can the researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica do it outside of working hours?
answer: Yes, as long as they perform social service activities or other infrequent, non-sustainable work outside of working hours and these activities do not interfere with their primary work.

title: Part-time job control status (1) Prohibited category
question: Can the researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica concurrently work for teaching or research work?
answer: If the Academia Sinica confirms that the job belongs to the category of teaching or research after review, then researchers and research technicians can be employed concurrently.

title: Part-time job control status (1) Prohibited category
question: Can the researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica concurrently hold positions in for-profit enterprises? If it is approved by Academia Sinica, is it possible?
answer: In principle, researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica cannot concurrently hold positions in profit-making enterprises. But if it is first approved by the Academia Sinica, then it can be done.

title: Part-time job control status (1) Prohibited category
question: If they concurrently serve as editors of academic journals, series of books, and textbook publishing organizations set by the Ministry of Education, can the researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica concurrently serve?
answer: Yes, as long as the work does not involve a for-profit business. However, if it is a specific profit-making position, it needs to be approved by the Academia Sinica before it can be used concurrently.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category
question: What kind of part-time jobs can researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica do?
answer:
After the researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica are approved, they can assume the positions of several profit-making enterprises. First of all, they can be selected by public stock equity management institutions as representative public stocks, or be recommended to serve as directors, supervisors, and other similar positions in direct or indirect government investment enterprises.

In addition, if they are the main R&D technology providers, they can serve as directors of start-up companies that have a technology transfer contract with Academia Sinica, but the concurrent term must be within the validity period of the contract. Similarly, if they are the main R&D technology providers and use the results of Academia Sinica to participate in the establishment of new businesses, they can act as initiators, but if they also hold administrative positions in Academia Sinica, they cannot do so.

Furthermore, as independent directors, they can work in state-owned enterprises, listed companies, banks and other subsidiaries 100% owned by financial holding companies that have an industry-research cooperation contract with Academia Sinica, but they cannot also hold administrative positions in Academia Sinica.

Finally, if it is based on the needs of scientific research, they can take up non-executive business positions in a profit-making enterprise that has a contract with Academia Sinica, and the concurrent employment period must also be within the validity period of the contract. If they have not signed a contract with Academia Sinica for technology transfer or funding research, then their concurrent tenure in the same for-profit enterprise can only be one year, and can be extended by one year at most.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category
question: If it is a major R&D technology provider, under what circumstances can it serve as a director of a start-up company?
answer: If you are the main R&D technology provider, there are two situations in which you can also serve as the director of the start-up company. First, if you have signed a technology transfer contract with Academia Sinica, you can serve as a director of the company, but the concurrent term must be within the valid period of the contract. Second, if you can use the research and development achievements of Academia Sinica to participate in the creation of new businesses, you can also serve as the sponsor of the new company. However, if you concurrently hold the administrative position of Academia Sinica, then you cannot carry out these activities.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category
question: Can researchers from Academia Sinica participate in the establishment of new businesses and act as initiators?
answer: If the researchers of the Academia Sinica are the main R&D technology providers and use the R&D results of the Academia Sinica to create new businesses, they can be the initiators of this new business. However, if the researcher also holds the administrative position of Academia Sinica, he cannot be the sponsor.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category
question: In which companies can I serve as an independent director, and if I am an administrative staff of Academia Sinica, can I serve as an independent director?
answer: The researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica can serve as independent directors in state-owned enterprises, listed companies, wholly-owned subsidiaries of financial holding companies such as banks, securities, insurance, and comprehensive securities companies that have entered into an industry-research cooperation contract with Academia Sinica, and can also serve as independent directors in unlisted public companies that plan to apply for listing through the resolution of the board of directors or shareholders' meeting. However, researchers and research technicians who concurrently hold administrative positions in Academia Sinica cannot hold such positions.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category
question: For the needs of scientific research, what kind of profit-making careers can the researchers of Academia Sinica concurrently hold? How long is this concurrent tenure?
answer: Researchers of Academia Sinica may concurrently serve as non-executive business positions of profit-making enterprises contracted with Academia Sinica for scientific research. As for the concurrent term, it must be within the validity period of the contract. However, if it is a for-profit enterprise that has not signed a technology transfer or research funding contract with Academia Sinica, the concurrent tenure period for the same for-profit enterprise can only be one year, and can only be extended by one year at most.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category - dismissal registration
question: If I held a position in a profit-making enterprise before working in Academia Sinica, how should I register for dismissal?
answer: Before you start working at Academia Sinica, you need to submit a written resignation and complete the dismissal registration within three months, and then submit the necessary supporting documents to Academia Sinica. If there are special circumstances that prevent you from completing the registration within the time limit, the Academia Sinica may allow you to extend it, but it can only be extended for three months at most. Remember that you cannot participate in business activities or receive remuneration until you complete the dismissal registration.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category - dismissal registration
question: If I cannot complete the dismissal registration within 3 months, can I apply for an extension?
answer: Yes, if you have special circumstances that prevent you from completing the dismissal registration within three months, and you have obtained the consent of Academia Sinica, you can apply for an extension. However, it should be noted that the extension period can only be up to three months. And before completing the dismissal registration, you cannot participate in the business or receive remuneration.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category - dismissal registration
question: Can I participate in the operation of the for-profit business or receive remuneration before completing the discharge registration?
answer: No, you are not allowed to participate in the operation of profit-making enterprises and receive remuneration before completing the dismissal registration.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category - dismissal registration
question: What relevant supporting documents do I need to submit to Academia Sinica to complete the dismissal registration?
answer: You need to submit proof of resignation to Academia Sinica to complete the dismissal registration.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category - dismissal registration
question: In case of special circumstances, how long can the dismissal registration be extended?
answer: If there are special circumstances, the dismissal registration can be extended to a maximum of three months.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category - handling procedures
question: If a researcher of Academia Sinica wants to serve as a public stock representative or a director of a government investment enterprise, what procedures do they need to go through?
answer: If the researchers of Academia Sinica want to concurrently act as public stock representatives or directors of government investment enterprises, they need to obtain a letter from the public stock equity management agency, then obtain the consent of the director of the research institute or research center to which they belong, and finally need the approval of Academia Sinica.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category - handling procedures
question: What conditions or steps do researchers need to meet to serve as directors or non-executive business positions of start-up companies?
answer:
If a researcher wants to serve as a director of a start-up company or a non-executive business position with special permission from Academia Sinica, first of all, a part-time start-up company or a profit-making business needs a letter. Next, part-timers must fill in the "Academia Sinica Personnel Need Part-time Permission for Technology Transfer and Scientific Research" and attach relevant forms.

The completed permission letter and related forms will be submitted to the business meeting of the affiliated research institute or research center for review. If the review is approved, the document will be forwarded to the Academia Sinica Conflict of Interest Management Committee for review. The whole process needs to be finally approved by the Academia Sinica.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category - handling procedures
question: If researchers at Academia Sinica want to start a new business, how should they apply?
answer: If a researcher at Academia Sinica wants to start a new business, he needs to first fill out a permission form, and then apply to his research institute or research center, and then just follow the procedures mentioned above.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category - handling procedures
question: What should I pay attention to if I want to concurrently serve as an independent director of a profit-making business?
answer:
To concurrently serve as an independent director of a profit-making enterprise, first, when nominated for appointment, the consent of the director of the research institute or research center to which he belongs must be obtained, and then the approval of the Academia Sinica must be obtained.

After being elected, the for-profit enterprise must be invited to hold the first board meeting after the shareholders' meeting, and complete the industry-research cooperation contract with Academia Sinica within three months from the date of election, and agree to pay academic rewards. Matters concerning contracts and rewards shall be counted from the date of appointment.

If the process is completed within the specified time within three months, the election will be considered legal. If it is not completed on time, Academia Sinica has the right to refuse to approve concurrently serving as an independent director.

In addition, if concurrently serving as an independent director results in other related work, an application must be submitted, and the director of the research institute or research center to which he belongs must agree, and then be approved by the Academia Sinica.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category - handling procedures
question: Are there any regulations regarding the selection of independent directors and the payment of academic rewards?
answer:
Yes, if a researcher or technician of Academia Sinica wants to serve as an independent director of a profit-making enterprise, he must first obtain the consent of the director of the research institute or research center to which he belongs, and must obtain the approval of Academia Sinica.

When this person is elected as an independent director, he needs to sign an industry-research cooperation contract with Academia Sinica and agree to pay academic rewards with the for-profit enterprise’s first board meeting after the shareholders’ meeting, that is, within three months from the date of election. This resolution shall be reflected in the minutes of the Board of Directors.

If the board of directors cannot complete the above-mentioned things within three months, the Academia Sinica will reject the person's application to concurrently serve as an independent director. If the company serving as the director fails to complete the signing of the industry-research cooperation contract and the payment of the academic reward within the three-month period, the part-time agreement will become invalid on the second day after the expiration.

In addition, if this person has other relevant positions arising from concurrently serving as an independent director, he must submit an application again, and must obtain the consent of the director of the research institute or research center to which he belongs, as well as the approval of the Academia Sinica.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category - handling procedures
question: What will happen if the part-time for-profit enterprise fails to complete the payment of the scholarship within the stipulated period?
answer: If the part-time profit-making enterprise fails to complete the signing of the industry-research cooperation contract and pay the academic feedback within the prescribed three months, then the Academia Sinica’s consent to the part-time job will be invalid from the day after the expiration of the three-month period. In other words, the eligibility for part-time employment will be revoked.

title: Part-time job control style (2) special permission category - handling procedures
question: What kind of application and review process is required for the relevant positions derived from concurrently serving as an independent director?
answer: Relevant positions derived from concurrently serving as independent directors need to apply first, then get the consent of the director of the research institute or research center to which they belong, and finally send it to the Academia Sinica for review. Only with the approval of Academia Sinica can the application be considered approved.

title: Part-time job control mode (2) special permission category - avoidance of interests, disclosure of interests
question: If the researchers and technicians of Academia Sinica also serve as public stock representatives or government investment undertakings, how can they avoid interests?
answer: If the researchers and technicians of Academia Sinica concurrently serve as representatives of public shares or government investment undertakings, they should avoid interests in accordance with the provisions of the Law on Avoidance of Conflicts of Interest for Public Officials. If these employees are also directors of start-up companies or profit-making enterprises, they also need to disclose whether they have the following interest relations with these companies or enterprises. For example, if they themselves, their spouses or minor children have received property interests of more than NT$150,000 from these profit-making enterprises in the past year, or held equity in these enterprises, they must be disclosed. But if they hold less than 5% of the shares of listed companies, this rule does not apply. Other circumstances that need to be disclosed include that they or their family members hold important positions in these for-profit enterprises; or they or their spouses or minor children are the trustees or agents of property for benefits. Finally, if they also start new businesses, they also need to disclose potential interests in these new businesses. After disclosure, if it is determined that there is a conflict of interest and no interest avoidance measures can be taken, then they cannot work part-time. Within two years of terminating part-time employment, they also need to avoid all procurement or planning reviews related to start-up companies, for-profit enterprises and related enterprises where they previously worked part-time. However, if the avoidance would hinder fair competition or the public interest, they can report to the hospital for exemption. If each unit finds that there are people who have not avoided interests, they should also notify these researchers and research technicians to avoid interests.

title: Part-time job control mode (2) special permission category - avoidance of interests, disclosure of interests
question: If the researchers and technicians of Academia Sinica also serve as directors or other non-executive business positions of start-up companies, what kind of interest relationship do they need to disclose?
answer: If the research and technical personnel of Academia Sinica also serve as directors or other non-executive business positions of start-up companies, they need to disclose whether they have the following interest relationships with start-up companies and profit-making enterprises. First, if you, your spouse, or your minor children have obtained property interests exceeding NT$150,000 from the profit-making enterprise in the previous year, or hold equity in the company, you must disclose it, but if the equity in the listed (cabinet) company is less than 5%, it is not necessary. Second, if you or your spouse, children, parents, grandparents, grandchildren, or siblings hold the position of person in charge, director, supervisor, or manager of the company, you also need to disclose. Third, if the properties entrusted or represented by the self, spouse, or minor children involve the above two types of interests or equity, it is also considered that the property interests or equity of the self, spouse, or minor children need to be disclosed.

title: Part-time job control mode (2) special permission category - avoidance of interests, disclosure of interests
question: If my family and I have obtained property interests exceeding NT$150,000 from this profit-making enterprise in the past year, or held equity in this profit-making enterprise, do we need to disclose it?
answer: If you and your spouse or minor children have received property interests exceeding NT$150,000 from that for-profit enterprise in the past year, or held equity interests in that for-profit enterprise, you must disclose it. However, if the company holds less than 5% of the shares of a listed or OTC company, there is no need to disclose it.

title: Part-time job control mode (2) special permission category - avoidance of interests, disclosure of interests
question: If I concurrently serve as the promoter of a new business venture, what potential interests do I need to disclose?
answer: If you also serve as the promoter of a new venture, you need to disclose the possible interest relationship with this new venture. As for the specific content that needs to be disclosed, it is up to the Academia Sinica to decide.

title: Part-time job control mode (2) special permission category - avoidance of interests, disclosure of interests
question: How will I be punished if a conflict of interest is discovered after disclosure?
answer: If after disclosure it turns out that you have a conflict of interest and cannot take appropriate steps to avoid it, the rule is that you will not be able to hold part-time work. Furthermore, within two years after you stop working part-time, you should avoid engaging in any procurement or plan review business related to your original part-time company or business behavior. However, if such avoidance is not conducive to fair competition or public interest, you may apply for the consent of Academia Sinica to exempt such avoidance. If the unit finds that you should but fail to avoid a conflict of interest, they have the right to ask you to withdraw immediately.

title: Part-time job control mode (2) special permission category - avoidance of interests, disclosure of interests
question: What matters need to be avoided within two years after the part-time job is terminated?
answer: Within two years after the part-time job ends, it is necessary to avoid business related to procurement or plan review with the start-up company, profit-making enterprise, and their affiliated companies that were originally part-time jobs. However, if doing so is detrimental to fair competition or the public interest, it can be reported to Academia Sinica, and there is no need to avoid it after obtaining consent.

title: Part-time job control mode (2) special permission category - avoidance of interests, disclosure of interests
question: If there is something that needs to be avoided but is not avoided, how will the unit deal with it?
answer: If it is found that a researcher or research technician should avoid certain things but has not avoided, then the relevant unit will require this person to avoid.

title: Part-time job control pattern (2) special permission category-academic reward
question: If I am a researcher at Academia Sinica and also serve as a director of a start-up company, how is the academic reward calculated?
answer: If you are a researcher at Academia Sinica and concurrently serve as a director of a start-up company, the academic reward is calculated based on 15% of the concurrent director fee you receive. Then you need to pay the academic reward in full to the account designated by Academia Sinica within two months after receiving the concurrent appointment approval notice from Academia Sinica.

title: Part-time job control pattern (2) special permission category-academic reward
question: How long is the academic reward payment period? When do I need to pay?
answer: The payment time of academic rewards is as follows. If you are a director of a start-up company or a non-executive business position of a profit-making enterprise, you need to pay within 2 months after receiving the part-time job approval notice from Academia Sinica. If you are an independent director of a profit-making enterprise, you need to pay within 2 months after signing the production-research cooperation contract.

title: Part-time job control pattern (2) special permission category-academic reward
question: How is the academic reward for concurrently serving as an independent director of a for-profit enterprise calculated?
answer: The academic reward for concurrently serving as an independent director is calculated at 20% of the part-time fee. Payment should be made within two months of the completion of the contract.

title: Part-time job control pattern (2) special permission category-academic reward
question: Where will the paid academic rewards be used?
answer: All academic rewards will be handed over to Academia Sinica, and then put into the scientific research fund of Academia Sinica.

title: Part-time job control pattern (2) special permission category-academic reward
question: What happens if a startup doesn't pay academic grants on time?
answer: If the start-up company fails to pay the academic rewards on time, Academia Sinica will cancel the company's part-time status and will use legal means to recover the unpaid academic rewards.

title: Part-time job control mode (3) general license category
question: How do researchers and technicians of Academia Sinica apply for part-time jobs?
answer:
If the researchers and technicians of Academia Sinica want to apply for part-time jobs, they must first ensure that the part-time job will not affect their main work. Then, unless there are special regulations, they need to obtain the consent of the director of the institute or research center where they are located, and then be approved by the Academia Sinica. Later, if their part-time job expires and they want to continue the part-time job, or if the part-time job is changed, they need to submit another application for review by the Academia Sinica.

Furthermore, if they want to participate in research projects funded outside Academia Sinica without using the internal work or other resources of Academia Sinica, they also need to apply for part-time jobs and get the approval of Academia Sinica in accordance with the regulations. However, if they will use the resources of Academia Sinica to participate in research outside the academy, they need to follow the key points of the work of the Academia Sinica's funded research plan.

title: Part-time job control mode (3) general license category
question: Who needs to agree to apply for a part-time job?
answer: The part-time job application needs to be approved by the director of the research institute or research center to which it belongs, as well as the approval of the Academia Sinica.

title: Part-time job control mode (3) general license category
question: What should I do if I want to renew my part-time job after the term expires or if there is any change in the part-time job?
answer: If you want to continue or change your part-time position, you must apply to Academia Sinica again and wait for approval.

title: Part-time job control mode (3) general license category
question: If the personnel of the Academia Sinica do not use their own resources to participate in other research projects, do they need to report to the Academia Sinica for approval?
answer: Yes, even if they do not use their own resources to participate in other research projects, the personnel of Academia Sinica still need to report to the academy for approval.

title: Part-time job control mode (3) general license category
question: If the resources of Academia Sinica are used to participate in research projects funded outside the academy, what regulations should be followed?
answer: If you use the resources of Academia Sinica to participate in a research project funded outside the academy, you need to follow the regulations of the Academia Sinica for accepting funding for research projects.

title: Part-time job control style (4) reporting category
question: If I am a researcher at Academia Sinica, can I concurrently serve in a non-profit cause or group?
answer: If you are a researcher at Academia Sinica and you do not hold an administrative position, you can indeed serve as a non-profit cause or group, as long as you do not receive a part-time fee from it. However, if you are teaching and researching in a private school, you must first obtain the consent of the supervisor and the approval of the Academia Sinica.

title: Part-time job control style (4) reporting category
question: I am a researcher at Academia Sinica, do I need to apply for consent and approval before I concurrently serve as an editor of an academic journal or course syllabus?
answer: If you are concurrently serving as an editor of an academic journal or course syllabus, if you do not concurrently hold an administrative position, are not involved in business operations, and do not receive part-time fees, you do not need to apply for consent and approval. But you still have to handle part-time job disclosure according to the regulations.

title: Part-time job control style (4) reporting category
question: I am a researcher who holds an administrative position. If I do not accept a part-time fee, attendance fee or review fee while holding other positions, do I still need to apply for consent and approval?
answer: No, you do not need to apply for consent and approval as long as you are working part-time in connection with your administrative duties and you are not receiving part-time, attendance or review fees. But you still have to disclose your concurrent job according to the regulations.

title: Part-time job control style (4) reporting category
question: If I participate in social welfare activities outside of working hours, do I need to apply for consent and approval?
answer: No, as long as your activities are outside working hours, hostile to social welfare, and not long-term and continuous work, you do not need to apply for consent and approval.

title: Part-time job control style (4) reporting category
question: In addition to these conditions, are there any special circumstances that can be exempted from applying for consent and approval, and then you can work part-time?
answer: In addition to the conditions listed above, if there are other circumstances, as long as the Academia Sinica announces that it is possible, then the part-time job under these circumstances can be exempted from application for consent and approval.

title: Part-time job control pattern (5) exemption from control
question: If researchers or research technicians of Academia Sinica work part-time in government agencies or public schools, do they still need to apply for consent and approval?
answer: If they work part-time in government agencies or public schools, they do not need to apply for consent and approval.

title: Part-time job control pattern (5) exemption from control
question: If I perform and get paid according to my expertise outside working hours, do I need to declare in advance?
answer: If you are paid for your expertise outside of working hours, you do not need to declare it in advance. However, if you authorize your property, intellectual property, or likeness and are properly rewarded for doing so, you don't need to declare in advance.

title: Part-time job control pattern (5) exemption from control
question: In addition to the circumstances mentioned in the previous two items, under what circumstances can a part-time job be performed without approval?
answer: In addition to the previous two situations, as long as it is the situation announced by the Academia Sinica, you can work part-time without approval.

title: Part-time job control pattern (5) exemption from control
question: Under what circumstances do you need to stop working part-time?
answer:
If the part-time jobs of researchers or research technicians of Academia Sinica fall into the following situations, they need to stop part-time jobs:
First, they work part-time in government departments, public schools or administrative legal person task groups or temporary positions.
Second, the remuneration they obtain by using their personal talents outside of working hours, or the consideration obtained for things related to their property, intellectual property rights and portrait rights authorization.
The third is the specific situation announced by the Academia Sinica. In these cases, they are not required to apply for consent and approval, nor are they required to disclose part-time employment. However, if the part-time job is revoked, or ordered to stop part-time work, then they have to stop part-time work.

title: Define standard part-time job matters
question: How does Academia Sinica regulate the part-time jobs of researchers and research technicians outside Academia Sinica?
answer: Academia Sinica has specially formulated a principle called the principle of part-time treatment of researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica. Through this set of principles, they can regulate the part-time work of researchers and research technicians outside Academia Sinica.

title: Define standard part-time job matters
question: What are the principles for handling part-time jobs of researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica?
answer: Academia Sinica has specially formulated a set of principles to regulate the part-time jobs of researchers and research technicians outside Academia Sinica.

title: Define standard part-time job matters
question: What regulations do I need to abide by when working part-time outside Academia Sinica?
answer: You need to abide by the part-time processing principles for researchers and research technicians stipulated by Academia Sinica.

title: Define standard part-time job matters
question: What kind of regulations and restrictions does Academia Sinica have on the part-time work of researchers and research technicians?
answer: In order to regulate the part-time jobs of researchers and research technicians outside Academia Sinica, Academia Sinica has formulated a set of principles as the basis for their part-time jobs.

title: Part-time negative conditions
question: If I work in Academia Sinica, what circumstances prevent me from working part-time?
answer: If you work at Academia Sinica, there are many situations that prevent you from working part-time. For example, if your part-time job conflicts with the nature of your work at Academia Sinica, it will not work. In addition, if your part-time job will have a bad impact on your main job, or may damage the image of Academia Sinica, you will also be prohibited from part-time jobs. Also, if there is a possibility of divulging official secrets, or if there are doubts about private interests, you cannot work part-time. Part-time jobs are also not allowed if there is a risk of improper use of public funds or public property, violation of academic ethics, threat to the safety and health of personnel, violation of ethics or impact on the evaluation results of academic research, and possible conflicts of interest.

title: Part-time negative conditions
question: If my part-time job is too contrary to the nature of my job, will we be asked to stop?
answer: Yes, if there is too much conflict between your part-time job and the nature of your job, Academia Sinica may ask you to stop part-time job.

title: Part-time negative conditions
question: If my part-time job may damage the image of Academia Sinica, can I continue this job?
answer: If your part-time job may damage the image of Academia Sinica, then you should not be able to continue this job.

title: Part-time negative conditions
question: Is it possible that my part-time job may lead to the leakage of official secrets, will this be prohibited?
answer: Yes, if your part-time job may lead to leakage of official secrets, Academia Sinica will prohibit it.

title: Part-time negative conditions
question: If my part-time job has the potential to lead me to malpractice, will that be stopped?
answer: If your part-time job may allow you to engage in personal fraud, Academia Sinica will not agree.

title: Part-time negative conditions
question: Will my part-time job cause me to improperly use Academia Sinica's public funds or property, and will I be asked to stop it?
answer: Yes, if there is such a possibility in your part-time job, Academia Sinica has the right to ask you to stop part-time job.

title: Part-time negative conditions
question: If I violate academic ethics because of my part-time job, will this situation stop me from continuing to work part-time?
answer: Yes, if you violate academic ethics because of part-time jobs, Academia Sinica will ask you to stop part-time jobs.

title: Part-time negative conditions
question: If my part-time job will affect the safety or health of people, will this be prohibited?
answer: Yes, if your part-time job may affect the safety or health of personnel, Academia Sinica will not approve it.

title: Part-time negative conditions
question: If the results of the research performance evaluation are not good, will the chance of part-time employment be lost?
answer: Yes, if the results of the research performance evaluation are not good, according to the regulations of Academia Sinica, the part-time job may be suspended.

title: Part-time negative conditions
question: .If my part-time job violates the conflict of interest, can I continue this job?
answer: If your part-time job has a violation of conflict of interest, you cannot continue this job.

title: Part-time hours and part-time fee
question: How many hours can researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica work part-time at most in a week?
answer: Part-time hours can be up to 8 hours a week.

title: Part-time hours and part-time fee
question: How many start-up companies or businesses can the researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica concurrently hold?
answer: They can concurrently hold up to four start-up or business roles.

title: Part-time hours and part-time fee
question: Will Academia Sinica announce the situation of employees holding concurrent positions?
answer: If so, the Academia Sinica will regularly announce the part-time jobs of employees who concurrently serve as directors of start-up companies, promoters of new businesses, independent directors of profit-making enterprises, and non-executive business operations.

title: Part-time hours and part-time fee
question: How is the salary of part-time researchers of Academia Sinica calculated?
answer: The part-time salary of researchers or research technicians of Academia Sinica is usually calculated according to the payment table for part-time expenses of military, public and educational personnel. However, if they are researchers, such as deans, vice deans or part-time supervisors, their part-time salaries are not limited to the regulations on part-time fees for military, public and educational personnel.

title: Part-time hours and part-time fee
question: Is there a cap on part-time fees for researchers?
answer: There is no upper limit on the part-time fees of researchers, including deans, vice-presidents, and part-time supervisors, and is not limited by the part-time fee payment table for military, public and educational personnel.

title: On-the-job disclosure and annual disclosure
question: What should I do if I already have a part-time job when I arrive at the job?
answer: If you already have a part-time job when you arrive at the job, you need to fill in a "Notice of Disclosure of Part-time Job by Academia Sinica Personnel before Arrival", explaining the part-time job you have already held. Then, it must be approved by the supervisor of your research institute or research center and approved by Academia Sinica. If it is not approved, you need to stop working part-time immediately.

title: On-the-job disclosure and annual disclosure
question: What kind of requirements need to be completed before the end of July every year?
answer: Before the end of July each year, each unit needs to sort out the "Academia Sinica Researcher and Research Technician Part-time Job Disclosure Form" filled out by its researchers and research technicians, and then send it to Academia Sinica for reference. At the same time, it is also necessary to evaluate and review the part-time jobs of the affiliated researchers and research technicians to see if they are allowed to continue part-time jobs.

title: On-the-job disclosure and annual disclosure
question: If I want to continue to work part-time, what assessment do I need to go through?
answer: Yes, if you want to continue to work part-time, your part-time job situation will be evaluated and reviewed every year. This assessment will be carried out by your institution. The results of the evaluation will be used as the basis for agreeing to continue your part-time job. So if you want to continue to serve concurrently, you need to pass this assessment.

title: On-the-job disclosure and annual disclosure
question: What documents do I need to fill out if I am part-time in a start-up with a technology transfer or research contract?
answer: You need to fill in the document "Academia Sinica personnel need part-time job permission in response to technology transfer and scientific research (annual disclosure)".

title: On-the-job disclosure and annual disclosure
question: I have a part-time business, if it is not approved, do I need to stop immediately?
answer: Yes, if your part-time business has not been approved by Academia Sinica, you must stop part-time work immediately.

title: Handling of part-time job violations
question: What should be done if a researcher or technician of Academia Sinica violates the part-time job regulations?
answer: If the researchers or technicians of Academia Sinica violate the regulations on part-time employment, they should be transferred to the group-level ethics committee of Academia Sinica, and reviewed in accordance with the settings and operation points of the ethics committees at all levels of Academia Sinica.

title: Handling of part-time job violations
question: To which committee will a person who violates the part-time employment policy be referred to for consideration?
answer: Those who violate the part-time job regulations will be transferred to the group-level ethics committee of Academia Sinica for review.

title: Handling of part-time job violations
question: What procedures will be followed to consider these cases of violation of the part-time job regulations?
answer: These cases will be sent to the group-level ethics committee of the Academia Sinica, and then reviewed according to the settings and operation points of the ethics committees at all levels of the Academia Sinica.

title: Part-time course
question: Can the researchers and technicians of Academia Sinica go to the school to teach?
answer: Yes, as long as it does not affect their work in Academia Sinica, and the teaching time during office hours cannot exceed four hours a week.

title: Part-time course
question: If the staff of Academia Sinica want to go to the school to teach part-time, what is the upper limit of the weekly teaching time?
answer: If the researchers and technicians of Academia Sinica want to go to the school to teach part-time, the upper limit of teaching time is 4 hours a week. But this must be on the premise of not affecting their own work in Academia Sinica.

title: Part-time course
question: Will the part-time teaching of Academia Sinica's personnel affect their own work?
answer: No, as long as their teaching does not affect their own work, and the sum of teaching during office hours does not exceed 4 hours per week, they can go to school to teach part-time.

title: Part-time course
question: Does the part-time course at Academia Sinica need to be during office hours?
answer: Yes, if the researchers of Academia Sinica want to teach concurrently, they must do it during office hours, but the total teaching time per week cannot exceed 4 hours. And none of these can affect their original work.

title: Part-time course
question: Will the time of joint teaching be counted together with the time of part-time teaching?
answer: Yes, the joint teaching time and part-time teaching time will be counted together, but the total should not exceed four hours per week.

title: Part-time course
question: How should the researchers and research technicians of the Academia Sinica come to the school to teach?
answer: When researchers and research technicians from Academia Sinica come to teach at the school, they first need to compile their teaching hours and timetable within two weeks after the start of the school year, and then obtain the consent of the director and director of the institute or center to which they belong. After that, the information can be reported to Academia Sinica for future reference. In terms of public holidays, they need to obtain the approval of the hospital before they can go to the school to teach. At this time, the approved official documents will be used instead of the leave slips, and the research institutes or centers will register with public holidays.

title: Part-time course
question: Do you need to compile the teaching hours and teaching schedule of your researchers and research technicians within a few weeks after the start of each semester?
answer: Within two weeks after the start of the semester, the number of teaching hours and the teaching schedule of the affiliated researchers and research technicians need to be compiled.

title: Part-time course
question: How to register the public holidays when researchers and research technicians come to the school to teach?
answer: If researchers and research technicians teach at the school, their public holidays should be registered by the respective institute or center. However, it should be noted that this kind of public holiday is replaced by the approved official document.

title: Part-time course
question: Can the official document of approval for teaching at the school replace the leave slip?
answer: Yes, if the researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica have the consent of the academy to go to the school to give lectures, they can use the approved official documents to replace the fake slips. Such public holidays will be registered by various institutes or centers.

title: leave policy
question: How many days of personal leave can I take per school year?
answer: You can take 7 days of personal leave per academic year.

title: leave policy
question: How many days off can I take if a family member is sick and needs my care?
answer: You can take 7 days of family care leave.

title: leave policy
question: How many sick days can I take if I am sick and need to take a break?
answer: If you are sick and need time off, you can take sick leave for up to 28 days per academic year.

title: leave policy
question: How many days of menstrual leave can a female employee take per month?
answer: Female employees can take one day of menstrual leave per month.

title: leave policy
question: How many days of marriage leave can I ask for after getting married?
answer: After getting married, you can ask for 14 days of marriage leave.

title: leave policy
question: How many days of prenatal leave and maternity leave can I take after pregnancy?
answer: After pregnancy, you can take 8 days of prenatal leave and 42 days of maternity leave.

title: leave policy
question: How many days of leave can I take to accompany my spouse for antenatal examination or childbirth?
answer: You can ask for 7 days leave.

title: leave policy
question: How many days of bereavement leave can I take when a loved one dies?
answer: If your parent or spouse dies, you can take 15 days of bereavement leave. In the event of the death of a step-parent, spouse's parent or child, 10 days of bereavement leave are available. Five days of bereavement leave are available in the event of the death of a great-grandparent, grandparent, spouse's grandparent, spouse's step-parent, or sibling. Bereavement leave can be requested in installments, but must be completed within 100 days of the death of the loved one.

title: leave policy
question: How many days off can I take to donate bone marrow or organs?
answer: The number of days off for bone marrow or organ donation will be given according to actual needs, so there is no specific number.

title: leave policy
question: .What will happen if I take more than the stipulated days of leave?
answer: If your leave exceeds the stipulated number of days, your personal leave will be used to offset the excess. And if your personal leave and family care leave add up to more than 7 days, then your salary will be deducted for the excess part. As for sick leave, if it exceeds 28 days, it will be offset by your personal leave.

title: leave policy
question: Can I take official leave if I am called by law to serve in the military?
answer: Yes, Academia Sinica rules can grant you official leave if you are called up by law for military service.

title: leave policy
question: Will Academia Sinica give public holidays to participate in government-sponsored polls?
answer: Yes, to participate in government-sponsored voting, Academia Sinica will give you a public holiday.

title: leave policy
question: If I am unfortunately injured on the way, will Academia Sinica give me a leave to adapt to my treatment process?
answer: Yes, if you are unfortunately injured on the way or have a dangerous injury or illness during the execution of research work, Academia Sinica will give you a leave of absence for treatment and recuperation, with a maximum period of two years.

title: leave policy
question: Will Academia Sinica allow me to accept domestic and foreign invitations, participate in research-related conferences or activities, and give me official leave?
answer: Yes, if Academia Sinica approves your request to accept domestic and foreign invitations to participate in conferences or activities related to research work, you can get public leave.

title: leave policy
question: Can I take time off if I need to testify or defend myself in court?
answer: Yes, as long as you need to appear in court to testify or defend based on legal obligations, and with the consent of Academia Sinica, you can take official leave.

title: leave policy
question: If I am diagnosed with a notifiable infectious disease and need to be quarantined, will Academia Sinica give me leave?
answer: Yes, if you are confirmed to have a notifiable infectious disease and need to be quarantined, Academia Sinica will give you a public holiday. However, if the onset of the disease is caused by your own fault, it is not within this scope.

title: leave policy
question: Can I take a public holiday to participate in activities or meetings designated by Academia Sinica?
answer: Yes, participating in activities or meetings designated by Academia Sinica can be regarded as a public holiday.

title: leave policy
question: What will the company do if I am sick and take leave for more than a year?
answer: If you take sick leave for more than one year, the company will in principle allow you to stay on without pay, or take steps to retire or dismiss you in accordance with the law. However, if you need to suspend pay due to performing research work, and there are special circumstances, Academia Sinica will consider extending the period of your stay without pay, up to another year.

title: leave policy
question: May I ask how long you can take public leave at most?
answer: A maximum of 2 years of public leave can be requested.

title: leave policy
question: I have not recovered after one year of work-related injury or sick leave without pay, what should I do next?
answer: Then you may have to retire or be sacked according to law. However, if the reason for your suspension of pay is to perform research work, and the circumstances are very special, then Academia Sinica may review your situation and consider extending your suspension without pay. However, this extension is limited to a maximum of one year.

title: leave policy
question: Are there special leave extensions for employees performing research work?
answer: Yes, there are. If the employee has special circumstances because of performing research work, Academia Sinica may consider extending the period of his stay without pay, but the extension can only be extended for one year at most.

title: leave policy
question: If I need to do research, can I apply for an extended leave?
answer: Yes, but there are some conditions to be aware of. If your leave has been 2 years, and you cannot cancel the leave, you may be suspended without pay or need to deal with retirement or dismissal according to law. If you apply for extended sick leave, or if you have not recovered due to work-related sick leave for one year since the date of suspension of pay, you will also need to apply for retirement or be dismissed according to law. However, if your suspension of salary is due to performing research work and there are special circumstances, Academia Sinica will consider and evaluate it, and it can be extended for up to one year.

title: leave policy
question: If I am a researcher at Academia Sinica and need to stay without pay due to illness, how can I apply for reinstatement after I recover?
answer: If you are sick and need to stay without pay, if you want to return to work after you recover, you need to provide a certificate from a legal medical institution or doctor, and then apply to Academia Sinica for reinstatement.

title: leave policy
question: If I want to apply for retirement or severance, but I am in the period of leave without pay, do I need to provide a medical certificate to apply for reinstatement?
answer: No, if you want to apply for retirement or dismissal during the period of suspension without pay, you can directly apply to the Academia Sinica for reinstatement, and you do not need to provide a medical certificate. The date you apply for reinstatement is the effective date of your retirement or severance.

title: leave policy
question: Where do I need to get a medical certificate if I recover from an illness while on furlough?
answer: You need to go to a legal medical institution or find a doctor to obtain a medical certificate.

title: leave policy
question: I apply for reinstatement after recovering from illness during the period of leave without pay. The date of reinstatement is the effective date of my retirement or dismissal, right?
answer: wrong. If you apply for reinstatement after recovering from illness, it does not mean that this day is the effective date of your retirement or dismissal. This is only applicable if you want to apply for retirement or severance during the period of suspension without pay, so that you can apply to Academia Sinica for reinstatement at any time. The date of reinstatement at this time is the date when your retirement or severance takes effect.

title: leave policy
question: How many days off can the researchers and research technicians of Academia Sinica take each academic year?
answer: Academia Sinica researchers and research technicians can take 21 days of leave per academic year.

title: leave policy
question: If I do not take my leave this year, can it be carried over to the next school year?
answer: Yes, if you don't finish your vacation this year, you can keep it to the next academic year. However, if you still do not complete the break by the next academic year, it will be considered as a waiver. Moreover, no overtime pay without vacation will be paid during this period.

title: leave policy
question: What if I haven’t finished my vacation this year and haven’t finished it in the next school year?
answer: If you don't take all your leave this year, you can carry over the untaken leave to the next school year. But if you still don't finish the vacation next school year, then the untaken vacation will be considered forfeited, that is, you will not have these vacations again. By the way, if you don't take time off, you won't get any overtime pay from it.

title: leave policy
question: If I joined the company after September, how will my leave be calculated?
answer: If you started employment after September, your leave will be calculated based on the number of months you worked between that month and the end of the school year. It should be noted that if you have been employed for less than one academic year and the calculated vacation days are less than half a day, it will be directly counted as half a day. If your vacation days are between half a day and one day, it will be counted as one day. Then from August of the following academic year, you will have 21 days off.

title: leave policy
question: How will my vacation days be calculated if I have served for less than one academic year?
answer: If you have served less than one academic year, your vacation days will be prorated based on the number of months you have served. For example, if your working days are calculated to be less than half a day, it will be counted as half a day. If it is more than half a day but less than a full day, it will be counted as one day. Remember, starting in August of the following school year, you will be given 21 days off.

title: leave policy
question: Starting from August of the next school year, how many days will be taken as leave?
answer: Starting from August of the next academic year, the number of leave days is 21 days.

title: Lectures and research regulations on vacation
question: If I meet the conditions of continuous service for three years and six months, can I apply for a leave of absence to engage in lectures and research for half a year?
answer: You fully meet this requirement, and you can apply for a half-year leave to do lectures and research work. Then send your lecture and research plan to the relevant meeting of the research institute or research center for approval. After passing, you can get full salary. It's just that during this vacation period, you cannot apply for an extension of the service period. Please pay attention.

title: Lectures and research regulations on vacation
question: How many people can apply for leave to engage in lectures and research in each institute year?
answer: The annual number of applicants for each research institute and research center should not exceed one-tenth of the number of specially-appointed researchers and fellows. If the number of people is less than ten, the approval of the dean is required.

title: Lectures and research regulations on vacation
question: If I return from a job without pay, can I immediately apply for a leave of absence to engage in lectures and research?
answer: Yes, Academia Sinica’s specially-appointed researchers and researchers who come back to work after being suspended without pay can apply for leave according to the regulations to engage in lectures and research. However, it should be noted that the calculation of seniority during your leave without pay is different. If you are seconded to a central government agency, your years of suspension without pay can be counted in half as the continuous service years for applying for leave. However, if you are seconded to a place other than the central government agency, the years of suspension without pay will not be counted. Only your years of service in Academia Sinica will be regarded as continuous service and can be used to apply for leave.

title: Lectures and research regulations on vacation
question: I was seconded to a central government agency before, can the seniority during that period be counted as the service seniority for applying for leave to do lectures and research work?
answer: When you go on secondment to a central government agency, your seniority is taken into account, but not completely. Only half of the seniority during that period will be counted towards the seniority of service when you apply for a leave of absence to do lectures and research work.

title: Lectures and research regulations on vacation
question: If I apply for a one-year leave to engage in lectures and research, can I apply in half-yearly intervals?
answer: Yes, if you want to apply for a one-year leave to engage in lecturing and research, you can apply twice in half a year each time. But remember, counting from the day when your leave is approved, your leave will have to be taken within two years. If more than two years have not been completed, it will be regarded as giving up.

title: Lectures and research regulations on vacation
question: If I don't take my approved leave, does that count as a waiver?
answer: Yes, if you do not take the leave within the approved time limit, it will be deemed that you have waived your right to leave this time.

title: Lectures and research regulations on vacation
question: If I am a Distinguished Researcher of Academia Sinica, how long does it take to apply for leave after I finish my lectures and research?
answer: After you come back from vacation, you need to continue working at Academia Sinica. This working period is twice as long as your vacation lectures and research. You will not be able to apply for leave until this period has passed.

title: Lectures and research regulations on vacation
question: What documents do I need to submit after the sabbatical study?
answer: You will be required to present a lecture research report. This report needs to be confirmed by your unit according to the internal review mechanism to check whether the content of the research report is consistent with the content of the original application plan, and then it can be submitted to Academia Sinica for review.

title: Lectures and research regulations on vacation
question: What happens if my lecture research report does not match what was originally planned?
answer: If your lecture research report does not match the content of the original plan, the unit may not pass the internal review. In this way, the report cannot be sent to the hospital for future reference. Failure to comply with the regulations may affect your right to apply for leave for lectures and research in the future.

title: Lectures and research regulations on vacation
question: What happens if I fail to meet my duty to return to hospital after leave?
answer: If you fail to fulfill your obligation to return to the hospital after the leave, you can no longer apply for leave to engage in lectures and research.

title: Lectures and research regulations on vacation
question: What is the so-called service period?
answer: The service period refers to the time when a researcher returns to Academia Sinica to continue working after taking a leave of absence to engage in lectures and research. This time is twice the length of his original leave to give lectures and research. That is to say, if a researcher takes a three-month vacation to give lectures or do research, he will have to work for six months after returning to Academia Sinica. If he fails to complete this period of service, he will not be able to apply for another leave of absence to give lectures and research.

title: Lectures and research regulations on vacation
question: If I fail to fulfill my service obligations, can I still apply for leave of absence for lecture research?
answer: No, if you have not fulfilled your service obligations, you cannot apply for a leave of absence to give lectures and research.

title: leave policy
question: If I want to take more than 30 days of leave, who needs to approve it?
answer: If you want to take leave of more than 30 days, you need to get the approval of the dean.

title: leave policy
question: Who will review the 30-day leave of absence for researchers and research technicians?
answer: It is reviewed by the supervisors of various research institutes (departments) and research centers.

title: leave policy
question: What kind of punishment will I have if I fail to go through the formalities for asking for leave or if I ask for leave with hypocrisy?
answer: If you do not go through the formalities of asking for leave or ask for leave with hypocrisy, it will be regarded as absenteeism. Once it is determined that you are absent from work, your salary for the days when you are absent from work will be deducted.

title: leave policy
question: How much will my salary be deducted if I am absent from work?
answer: If you are absent from work, your salary for the days of absence will be deducted.

title: leave policy
question: If the researchers and technicians of Academia Sinica want to ask for leave, what are the rules?
answer: If researchers or technicians of Academia Sinica want to ask for leave, the number of holidays will be deducted from the granted leave. However, if the official leave is required due to a work-related injury or illness, or the extended leave is required due to illness, the holiday will not be deducted in this case. If you ask for leave on time, you will count eight hours a day.

title: leave policy
question: How is the allowance for this holiday calculated?
answer: When the researchers and research technicians of the Academia Sinica ask for leave, the holiday will be deducted from the holiday payment. However, if the official leave is due to an official injury or illness, or if you are unwell and need to extend the leave, or conduct research during the leave, then the holiday will not be deducted. If you ask for leave on time, then one day counts as eight hours.

title: leave policy
question: Will the holidays be deducted in the event of a business injury or extended leave due to illness?
answer: No, holidays will not be deducted if it is a business injury or an extended vacation due to illness.

title: leave policy
question: If I take leave on time, how many hours will a day be counted as?
answer: If you leave on time, the day will be counted as eight hours.

title: Relevant regulations on the new recruitment, re-appointment and promotion of researchers
question: What are the qualifications for being a Distinguished Researcher?
answer:
There are several conditions for the qualifications of a Distinguished Research Fellow. First, if you have been a researcher at Academia Sinica for more than one year, and you have performed exceptionally well, made important contributions, and domestic and foreign academic circles recognize your value, then you have the opportunity to become a distinguished researcher.

In the second case, if you have been a professor in a research institution or university at home and abroad recognized by Academia Sinica for more than one year, and you have made significant academic contributions and achievements, and have been recognized by academic circles at home and abroad, then you may also be selected as a distinguished researcher.

Finally, if you are an academician of Academia Sinica, then you can also become a distinguished researcher.

title: Relevant regulations on the new recruitment, re-appointment and promotion of researchers
question: I have been a professor at a public university for one year, can I apply for a researcher position at Academia Sinica?
answer: Yes, as long as you have made important academic contributions, you are eligible for appointment as a researcher at the Central Academy of Sciences.

title: Relevant regulations on the new recruitment, re-appointment and promotion of researchers
question: Can I apply to be an associate researcher if I have been working as an assistant researcher at Academia Sinica for one year?
answer: Yes, as long as you have made important academic achievements during the year, you are eligible to apply to be an associate research fellow.

title: Relevant regulations on the new recruitment, re-appointment and promotion of researchers
question: Does the qualification of a research assistant only require academic qualifications, or does it also require other experience accumulation?
answer: Qualifications for research assistants not only require academic qualifications, but also some experience. For example, you graduated from a university or an independent college of related disciplines, and then worked as a research assistant at the Academia Sinica for at least four years, or you obtained a doctorate from a public university or a private university or independent college registered with the Ministry of Education, or a foreign university or independent college recognized by the Academia Sinica. In addition, if you have been an assistant professor at a public or private university for at least two years, or a lecturer for at least four years, or an assistant professor at a foreign university or independent college recognized by Academia Sinica, and you have conducted research work, you are also eligible. Another situation is that after you obtain a master's degree, you should work in research institutions at home and abroad recognized by Academia Sinica for at least four years (or three years if you have a bachelor's degree in medicine). So to put it simply, in addition to academic qualifications, certain research experience and work qualifications are also required.

title: Relevant regulations on the new recruitment, re-appointment and promotion of researchers
question: These regulations are clearly stipulated in which article of the organizational regulations of the Academia Sinica Institute?
answer: These regulations are clearly stipulated in Article 10, Article 9, Article 8, and Article 7 of the organizational regulations of the Academia Sinica Research Institute.

category: Regulations on Recruitment of Research Technicians
title: Relevant regulations on the new recruitment, re-appointment and promotion of research technicians
question: May I ask, what qualifications do I need to become a research technician?
answer: To become a Research Technician, you first need a doctorate or equivalent credential. Second, you must have research experience or professional experience related to your field of expertise, and this experience must be at least eight years. At the same time, you also need to have relevant professional works, such as professional books, technical reports, or your professional service experience. If you have been a Research Associate Technician and have done it for more than four years, with good performance, and have relevant professional work and experience, that is also possible.

category: Regulations on Recruitment of Research Technicians
title: Relevant regulations on the new recruitment, re-appointment and promotion of research technicians
question: I used to be a research assistant technician, what conditions do I need to meet if I want to be promoted to a research technician?
answer: You need to have a Ph.D. or equivalent and have at least eight years of experience in research work, a professional occupation or job related to your desired position, with specialized publications, technical reports (including technical products), or professional service experience; or, you have served four years or more in a research associate position with good results, and have professional publications or technical reports (including technical products) or professional service experience.

category: Regulations on Recruitment of Research Technicians
title: Relevant regulations on the new recruitment, re-appointment and promotion of research technicians
question: I would like to ask, what qualifications do research assistant technicians need to have?
answer: There are two conditions for the appointment of a Research Associate Technician. First, he needs to have a Ph.D. or its equivalent. He must have more than four years of research, professional or related work experience with good grades. He also needs to have specialized books or technical reports corresponding to the nature of the work he will be engaged in, or professional service experience. Secondly, if he has worked as a research assistant technician for more than four years, and his grades are also good, and he still needs to have specialized books or technical reports corresponding to the nature of the work he will be engaged in, or professional service experience, then he is also qualified as a research assistant technician.

category: Regulations on Recruitment of Research Technicians
title: Relevant regulations on the new recruitment, re-appointment and promotion of research technicians
question: I am a research assistant technician and want to be promoted to a research assistant technician, what should I do?
answer: If you wish to progress to Research Associate Technician, you will need a PhD or equivalent. Four years or more of past experience in research work or a specialized occupation related to your discipline is required, with good grades. In addition, you also need to have some professional works or technical reports, which of course also include your technical finished products or your previous professional service experience. If you have been a research assistant technician for more than four years, have excellent grades, and have specialized works or technical reports or professional service experience equivalent to the position of the research assistant technician to be promoted, you may also consider applying for promotion.

category: Regulations on Recruitment of Research Technicians
title: Relevant regulations on the new recruitment, re-appointment and promotion of research technicians
question: I do not have a Ph.D., is there any other way I can achieve my research assistant qualifications?
answer: Yes, if you have a master's degree with excellent grades, and have more than two years of experience in research work or specialized occupations or positions related to your discipline, plus specialized books or technical reports or professional service experience, you can also qualify as a research assistant. Alternatively, you may qualify if you have a bachelor's degree, have done research work or professional work related to your studies for more than four years, and have monographs, technical reports or professional service experience. Another situation is that if you have worked as a technical assistant for more than four years, and have specialized books or technical reports or professional service experience, you can also qualify as a research assistant.

category: Regulations on Recruitment of Research Technicians
title: Relevant regulations on the new recruitment, re-appointment and promotion of research technicians
question: May I ask what is the meaning of point 3 of the key points of the employment review for research technicians?
answer:
This third point is actually a regulation describing the different qualifications of research technicians.

To put it bluntly, if you want to be a research technician, you must have a doctorate degree and at least eight years of research or work experience related to your major, and you also need to have corresponding professional books or technical reports, or you have worked as a research assistant technician for more than four years and have performed well.

If you want to be a research assistant technician, you also need a doctorate degree and have more than four years of research or work experience related to your major, plus corresponding professional books or technical reports, or you have worked as a research assistant technician for more than four years with excellent grades.

Finally, if you want to work as a research assistant, you must have at least a doctorate and excellent performance, or you have at least two years of professional-related research or work on the basis of a master's degree, or you have a bachelor's degree but four years of professional-related research or work experience, and you need to perform in professional books or reports, or you have worked as a technical assistant for more than four years with excellent performance.

question: Who can I appeal an employment outcome to? How to do it?
answer: You can appeal to different institutions according to different situations within one month from the day after receiving the notification of the employment result. If the new employment case does not pass the vote of the academic group's employment review committee, you can apply to the college's employment review committee for another discussion. If the renewal, promotion or long-term employment is not approved by the research institute or research center, you can appeal to the employment review committee of the academic group you belong to. If the promotion or long-term appointment (including new appointments and long-term appointments at the same time) has passed the research institute or research center, but has not been reviewed by the academic group's employment review committee, you can also appeal to the institute's employment review committee within one month. If there is no appeal for more than one month, the result of the appointment will become certain. For the specific operation method, you can refer to the provisions of Article 23 and Article 25 of the key points of the new appointment, renewal, promotion, and special appointment review of researchers in the Academia Sinica.

question: What is the difference between the handling of re-employment, promotion, or long-term employment rejections and new employment cases?

In the case of renewal, promotion or long-term employment, if the reviewee fails to pass the review of the research institute or research center, the reviewee can appeal to the employment review meeting of the academic group to which he belongs within one month from the day after receiving the notice. If the promotion or long-term appointment has passed the review of the research institute or research center, but not the review of the academic group recruitment review committee, then the reviewee can appeal to the college recruitment review committee within one month from the day after receiving the notice. Generally speaking, the difference lies in the different objects of appeal. For new employment cases, the object of appeal is the employment review committee of the college, while for re-appointment, promotion or long-term employment, the object of appeal is the academic group employment review committee or the college employment review committee.
